Stay with us in the urgent work ahead. Donate monthly. {include "pre-header-spacing"}{beacon}

Stay in the fight.

Become a monthly donor to protect abortion access and all civil liberties.

Donate Monthly

{include "default_salutation"} –

Overturning Roe v. Wade would be an unprecedented action. Never before has the Supreme Court taken away a constitutional right it previously recognized.

This dangerous new precedent would result in half the states moving to ban abortion for 36 million people who can become pregnant across the country.

And it puts many other rights and freedoms – rights you and the ACLU have fought so hard for – at risk in ways we haven't seen in generations. Everything from our right to use birth control to LGBTQ rights.

While horrendous, our teams have been preparing for this moment. Millions of people are counting on us – you and the ACLU – to do everything we can to protect people's rights and defend our democracy. And so today, I'm asking you to deepen your commitment to this urgent work by becoming a monthly donor to the ACLU – a Guardian of Liberty.

{include "first_name"}, make a monthly pledge today to give ACLU lawyers, advocates, and experts the resources they need to relentlessly protect and defend our fundamental freedoms across all fifty states, D.C., and Puerto Rico.

As a Guardian of Liberty, your monthly support will have an immediate and powerful impact on the ACLU's work:

  • Protecting abortion access nationwide including litigation in the courts and proactive policy and ballot measure work across the states
  • Confronting anti-voter bills & racially motivated gerrymandering
  • Protecting trans youth from unconstitutional anti-trans bills nationwide
  • Upholding students' First Amendment rights against classroom censorship and book bans

Our teams have the experience, strategy, and determination to make incredible progress. And we're so grateful for your tremendous and generous support. But, with so much at stake right now, we really need you with us for the long haul.

That's why I'm urging you to deepen your impact on this critical work by becoming an ACLU monthly donor today. With your sustained support, we'll have the resources to stay in the fight for as long as it takes.

We'll be in touch over the coming weeks about the critical work you and the ACLU must advance. But, for right now, I want to thank you for continuing to support us and for choosing today to become an ACLU monthly donor – a Guardian of Liberty.

Thanks for all you do,

Anthony D. Romero
Pronouns: He, him, his
Executive Director, ACLU
